metadata.title: CVE-2019-10872 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Poppler 0.74.0. There is a heap-based bufferover-read in the function Splash::blitTransparent at splash/Splash.cc.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10872` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
libpoppler73 - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
poppler-utils - 0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.62.0-2ubuntu2.9').
